# index(before:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the position immediately before the given index.

## Declaration

```swift
func index(before index: EnumeratedSequence<Base>.Index) -> EnumeratedSequence<Base>.Index
```

## Return Value

The index value immediately before `i`.
title: index(before:)
